mapper.insert: insert into bbs(wname, title, content, passwd, wdate, grpno, indent, ansnum) values(#{wname},#{title},#{content},#{passwd},sysdate(), #{grpno},#{indent}+1,#{ansnum}+1 )

insert into bbs(wname, title, content, passwd, wdate, grpno, filename, filesize) values(#{wname},#{title},#{content},#{passwd},sysdate(), (SELECT ifnull(MAX(grpno),0) + 1 FROM bbs b),#{filename},#{filesize})
mapper.select:
